Description: Gilbane Building Company agreed to pay the United States $1.1 million to resolve allegations that W.G. Mills Incorporated -- a company with which Gilbane merged in November 2010 -- violated the False Claims Act by creating a front company, Veterans Constructors Incorporated, in order to be awarded a Coast Guard contract that was designated for Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Businesses.
